query:
SELECT 
  'points_records_total' as metric, 
  SUM(amount) as value 
FROM points_records 
WHERE status = 'approved'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'settlements_total', SUM(actualDistributionPoints) FROM settlements WHERE status = 'distributed'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'points_by_type_genesis', SUM(amount) FROM points_records WHERE type = 'genesis' AND status = 'approved'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'points_by_type_eco', SUM(amount) FROM points_records WHERE type = 'eco' AND status = 'approved'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'points_by_type_trade', SUM(amount) FROM points_records WHERE type = 'trade' AND status = 'approved';
